name: I dare you-escape!!!
description:
This game is made for the 4MB jam. 

Thank you for stopping by. I dare you in this game to finish the impossible level. 

Just click R in the game as said on top.

WASD to move The player.

Thank you, Collen!! I learned Python in just 3 days and made this game in just 2days. Came to know about this game just 5 days ago.
